channel.title: StevenAiDigest
channel.description: Daily memo. Four items max. Source backed. Written for operators.

item.title: Edition 2026-02-04
item.description: Morning: AI model releases and research breakthroughs. Midday: AI agent breakthroughs and practical workflow tools.

item.title: Edition 2025-12-05
item.description: AWS re:Invent packaging: permissions automation, data access, replication, and cost controls as AI primitives.

item.title: Edition 2025-11-18
item.description: Gemini 3 ships as a product layer. Distribution and workflow integration tighten the model race.

item.title: Edition 2025-10-06
item.description: AMD and OpenAI announce a 6 GW deployment agreement. Compute becomes supply chain and capital structure.

item.title: Edition 2025-09-15
item.description: Agents move toward production grade infrastructure: connectivity, policy controls, and observability.

item.title: Edition 2025-08-07
item.description: GPT-5 appears in the API with smaller variants. Pricing and routing strategy become the operator edge.
